messages.message: Invalid uncompressedByteLength in Level Index. For non-supercompressed files the uncompressedByteLength must match the expected value of byteLength.
messages.details: Level 2 uncompressedByteLength is 63 but based on the vkFormat, DFD and image sizes the expected value is 64.

messages.message: Invalid uncompressedByteLength in Level Index. For non-supercompressed files the uncompressedByteLength must match the expected value of byteLength.
messages.details: Level 1 uncompressedByteLength is 255 but based on the vkFormat, DFD and image sizes the expected value is 256.

messages.message: Invalid uncompressedByteLength in Level Index. For non-supercompressed files the uncompressedByteLength must match the expected value of byteLength.
messages.details: Level 0 uncompressedByteLength is 1023 but based on the vkFormat, DFD and image sizes the expected value is 1024.
